channel.title: Making a server download help me!
channel.description: Hey guys i need help on making my server downloadable on mediafire ect. I know how to make it a .rar file with winrar but how can ppl play my server through download without downloading all of my client and source what files do i need to give to them for a download and to make it playable?????

item.title: Making a server download help me!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Run.bat to initialize the main class and delete all of the .Java files to prevent hackers and anti leech and what not.

Read full topic
